Description: Fragment of flattened handle at neck join of a Knidian pottery transport amphora. Clay medium red-brown. Rectangular stamp with grape cluster symbol.
Type series: KT 782. (Virginia Grace's unpublished K(nidian) T(ype) series)
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (300)
